verses.name: Ezekiel 32:9
verses.text: I will also vex the hearts of many people, when I shall bring thy destruction among the nations, into the countries which thou hast not known.

verses.name: Ezekiel 32:10
verses.text: Yea, I will make many people amazed at thee, and their kings shall be horribly afraid for thee, when I shall brandish my sword before them; and they shall tremble at every moment, every man for his own life, in the day of thy fall.

verses.name: Ezekiel 32:11
verses.text: For thus saith the Lord God; The sword of the king of Babylon shall come upon thee.
